page.title: 19CLUBS- CAMELS'AREA
page.content: There are many clubs serving the area.These cater for a wide variety of tastes for both young and old. Most of these are centred round the larger village of Queen Camel,but some are centred in West Camel. For those with sporting interests there are football, cricket and rounders clubs using the villages sports fields.The bowls club has its own ground in Queen Camel.Skittles and darts clubs play in the 3 public houses. The girls are able to join the Brownies and Girl Guides, but boys have to move out of the area for Cubs and Boy Scouts.For children interested in drama there is a club called the Queen Camel Players. Young and old enjoy campanology at Queen Camel and there is a horticulture club too.
